metadata.title: Exoterior – Maintenance Booking
metadata.description: Book home and office maintenance services. Fast, certified, reliable.

hero.tagline: Professional maintenance for your home and office

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We cover all major maintenance categories

why.title: Why Exoterior
why.fastDesc: We respond quickly and schedule at your convenience.
why.transparentDesc: Estimated cost before we start the work.

how.title: How It Works
how.step1Desc: Pick the category and specific tasks you need.
how.step2Desc: Select an appointment slot that suits you.
how.step3Desc: Review and submit. We’ll get in touch.

booking.title: Book a Service
booking.notAvailableOutsideCairo: We currently serve Cairo only. For other areas, please contact us by phone or email.
booking.useMyLocationDesc: We'll fill governorate and address from your device location.
booking.useMyLocationDescAddress: We'll fill the address from your device location.
booking.chooseServiceHint: Choose one or more services, then describe your problem below.
booking.describeProblemPlaceholder: What do you need? Describe the issue in a few words…
booking.appointmentDuration: Appointment duration: 1 hour. Choose date and time below.
booking.pickTimeHint: Available 12 PM – 10 PM. Pick a slot:
booking.slotStorageNotice: Slot times are not reserved on this server. To prevent double-booking, the site owner can enable Supabase (see README). You will still receive a confirmation by email.
booking.paymentMethodsDesc: We accept cash, InstaPay, and mobile wallets (Vodafone Cash, Orange Cash, Etisalat Cash, and others). Payment is settled on site after the service.
booking.contactAfterSubmit: We’ll contact you on this number to confirm.
booking.successMessage: We received your request and will contact you shortly to confirm.

validation.dateBeforeMin: Please choose today or a future date.
validation.slotJustBooked: This slot was just booked. Please choose another date or time.
validation.submitFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: We aim to schedule within 24–48 hours depending on availability.
faq.a2: Yes. You can choose a slot that suits you via the booking link.
faq.a3: It’s an estimate. Final price may vary slightly after we assess the job.
